text:
Hi folks, I wrote an article about 3D printing 101 for an agency client. 

The main client looked at my article and was like "This looks good but here are some minor changes" and proceeded to change the whole damn outline.

It was a near-total rewrite (more than 90% of new headers in the outline).

When I mentioned that to the agency client, they cancelled the contract with the main client. 

Anyone here who is accepting a paid guest post (3000+ words) on a 3D printing how-to (or 101) article?

I am also looking to be connected to someone who can buy this article off of me. I am ready to do 1 round of edits.

Do PM me.

Thanks,
Navin
